attributes.action: Launch an enquiry into the effectiveness of fixed penalty points for speeding offences and its potential abolishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of law abiding tax payers are given fixed penalty points every year for speeding, we the undersigned find these points unjust, unfair, do not stop drivers from speeding they simply alienate the public from the police and government. It is also thought that other more serious traffic violations such as no insurance (Increasing insurance premiums for the general public) get away with such offences too lightly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
